Reason: The 'hinted_handoff_throttle_in_kb' configuration option is performance-sensitive. This is because it directly affects the rate at which hints are delivered to specific nodes in the cluster, leading to notable performance variations at the system level. The configuration involves performance-related operations that are time-extensive, as it controls the maximum hints traffic going towards a particular node from the rest of the cluster. This can have a substantial impact on system performance, making it a performance-sensitive configuration.
